embed.title: tMuslim v2023.3 Patch Notes
embed.description: Welcome to the new tMuslim Architecture! Gone are the terrible non-OOP methods of yesterday! Hello Cogs and Classes! Here's the scoop on the new features:

fields.name: :Python: New Architecture!
fields.value: tMuslim has been fully rewritten to support Cogs! Adding new features is now easier than ever!

fields.name: :clock1: Disable 5-minute-reminder
fields.value: Do the 5-minute prayer reminders bother you? Well, bother no more! Now you have the option to disable reminders! Try /toggle5minutes

fields.name: :vscode: Faster than ever before!
fields.value: We removed redundant code and sped up common tasks! Now tMuslim is faster than ever!
